task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 297Â°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I can now see the full target building, which is a 5-story residential structure with a gable roof; estimating each floor at ~3 meters plus ~1 meter for the roof gives a total height of approximately 16 meters.
